p: Marrubium spp. ( aschersonii, globosum, etc.) have multiple actions, including antimicrobial and anti-inflammatory activities. Marrubasch A-F and marrubenol, isolated from the ethanolic extract of M. aschersonii, exhibited weak reduction in iNOS activity and, consequentely, NO production [ 217]. Marrulibanoside, obtained from the aerial parts of M. globosum, inhibited catalytic activity of iNOS and COX-2enzymes, and consequentely, the PEG2 and NO production.
